content:
A coordinate map of the local disc golf course is shown below.  The tee on the first hole is located at the point $(1,2)$. The hole is located at the point $(8,2)$.

**Plot the tee and the hole on the map.**

[[☃ interactive-graph 1]] 

**How far is the tee from the hole?**
